Course Content: This course explains the complete process cycle of data informatics domain including business understanding, data governance, data acquisition, modelling, verification, deployment and visualization subjects. Current topics such as data driven organizations, and ethical and legal issues will be also covered in the course. Real world cases will be presented throughout the course and students will get experience in data science platforms such as Python.
